abstract: Little Eye Labs provides monitoring and analysis tools to measure the performance of Android apps, which will play into Facebook’s mobile strategy.
snippet: Little Eye Labs provides monitoring and analysis tools to measure the performance of Android apps, which will play into Facebook’s mobile strategy.
lead_paragraph: Little Eye Labs, an Indian analytics start-up, announced on Wednesday that it would be acquired by Facebook in a move that helps drive the company’s mobile strategy.

headline.main: Facebook to Buy Indian Mobile Analytics Start-Up
